name: init_user
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーのペナルティカウントを初期化"]
body: let record = & mut ctx . accounts . record ;
record . user = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
msg ! ("Initialized penalty record for {}" , record . user) ;

name: add_penalty
attributes: # [doc = " 管理者がペナルティを加算"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . admin . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let record = & mut ctx . accounts . record ;
msg ! ("Added {} penalty points to {} (total now {})" , points , record . user , record . penalty) ;

fields.name: record
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーペナルティ記録PDA"] # [account (init , payer = admin , space = 8 + 32 + 1 , seeds = [b"penalty" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: record
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存のペナルティ記録PDA"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"penalty" , record . user . as_ref ()] , bump , has_one = user)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ペナルティ対象ユーザー"]

fields.name: penalty
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在のペナルティポイント"]
